title: Enhance UI with modern design and smooth animations

requirements.text: Add smooth page transition animations when switching between sections (Business Card, Saved Content, Bookmarks, Ideas, Reminders) in the bottom navigation

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade in or slide in smoothly when navigated to
Transitions are performant on mobile devices
Animation duration is between 200-400ms

requirements.text: Implement micro-interactions for all interactive elements: buttons should have hover/active states with scale or color transitions, form inputs should animate focus states, and cards should animate on hover

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons show visual feedback on press/hover with smooth transitions
Form inputs have animated focus indicators
List items and cards have subtle hover effects
Animations respect user's prefers-reduced-motion setting

requirements.text: Add staggered fade-in animations for list items when rendering saved content, bookmarks, ideas, and reminders lists

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: List items animate in with a stagger delay (each item appears slightly after the previous one)
Animation is smooth and does not cause layout shift
Works consistently across all list views

requirements.text: Implement smooth modal/dialog entrance and exit animations for all form dialogs (bookmark form, saved content form, idea form, reminder form, profile setup)

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: Dialogs scale in and fade in when opening
Dialogs scale out and fade out when closing
Backdrop fades in/out smoothly
Animations are synchronized and feel polished

requirements.text: Add loading state animations: skeleton loaders or pulse animations for content that is loading, and smooth transitions when content appears

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: Loading states show animated skeletons or pulse effects
Content fades in smoothly when loaded
Loading animations are consistent across all sections

requirements.text: Modernize the visual design with updated typography (larger, bolder headings with better hierarchy), refined spacing, and contemporary card/container styles with subtle shadows or borders

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: Typography follows a clear hierarchy with distinct heading and body text styles
Spacing between elements feels balanced and modern
Cards and containers have refined visual treatments (shadows, borders, or subtle gradients)
Overall design feels contemporary and polished

requirements.text: Add animated empty state illustrations: when lists are empty, show animated icons or illustrations (subtle motion like floating or pulsing)

quotes: Ui رو بهتر و مدرن‌تر با انیمه های جذاب و متحرک بساز

acceptanceCriteria: Empty state images have subtle CSS animations (float, pulse, or gentle movement)
Animations loop smoothly
Animations do not distract from the message

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
All animations must respect the user's prefers-reduced-motion accessibility preference
Animations must be performant on mobile devices with no jank or frame drops
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond UI/animation improvements
Changing backend logic or data models
Modifying the navigation structure or section organization
Adding external animation libraries (use CSS transitions, Tailwind animations, and Framer Motion if already available)
